data.actual_result: It stays in the same colour.
data.expected_result: The box should change colour according to theme.
data.short_description: The limit number doesn't change colour according to theme.
data.steps_to_repro: - Set a user limit to a voice channel. - Long press on the channel's name and observe the box which contains the max limit of the channel. - Switch to light theme. - Long press on the voice channel and observe the box again.
